.. _open_cluster:

Open cluster
------------

To test the :ref:`Priors` in the specific case of an open cluster, we simulated 1000 objects from a Pleiades like cluster. In this case the distances were drawn from a Gaussian distribution with mean at :math:`\mu=135` pc, and standard deviation :math:`\sigma=20` pc.  


	.. _cluster_uniform_5:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Uniform/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Uniform prior with scale 500 pc.


	.. _cluster_gaussian_1:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Gaussian/1/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _cluster_gaussian_5:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Gaussian/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _cluster_gaussian_10:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Gaussian/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Gaussian prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.


	.. _cluster_cauchy_1:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Cauchy/1/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _cluster_cauchy_5:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Cauchy/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _cluster_cauchy_10:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/Cauchy/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a Cauchy prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.


	.. _cluster_EDBJ2015_1:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/EDBJ2015/1/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`1\sigma`.


	.. _cluster_EDBJ2015_5:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/EDBJ2015/5/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`5\sigma`.

	.. _cluster_EDBJ2015_10:

	.. figure:: images/Pleiades_like/EDBJ2015/10/Errors.*
		:align: left

		Relative errors obtained using a EDBJ2015 prior with scale :math:`10\sigma`.
